techBaron.name: Jean
techBaron.text: Monsieur, I am a journalist for Investigate Paris.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Magnifique! Bonjour, my friend.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Pardon, could you please stop poking my nose with your dictaphone?

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: How can I help you?

techBaron.name: Assistant
techBaron.text: Oui, how can Monsieur help you?

techBaron.name: Jean
techBaron.text: I have a few questions for you.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Ah, you heard about my plans for the Louvre?

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: They just finished that ugly glass pyramid this year

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: —and for what?

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: So tourists can stare at some old paintings we Parisians don’t even care about.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Fichtre!

techBaron.name: Assistant
techBaron.text: Fichtre!

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: If you ask me, we should give the people of Paris

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: something they would truly benefit from:

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: a beautiful skyscraper.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: With bright neon-colored signs on top,

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: illuminating my name across the night sky.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: And of course, a spot to land my helicopter.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: I mean—wouldn’t everyone benefit from that?

techBaron.name: Assistant
techBaron.text: Magnifique!

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: It will be très modern, très chic

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Oui, oui! Culture is a relic of the past, in my very humblest opinion.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: The future is now, my friend.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: People just don’t care about culture anymore.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Art belongs out of museums and into the homes of the rich.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: The same goes for churches and their artifacts.

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Y2K is coming!

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Dotcom is the new god!

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: Or do you think it’s a coincidence

techBaron.name: Monsieur Arnaque
techBaron.text: that people would rather stay home than visit places of art or worship?

techBaron.name: Assistant
techBaron.text: Sacrebleu!

priest.name: Jean
priest.text: Good afternoon, Father. I'm Jean, a journalist. I’m researching why culture is so important to people. Could I ask you a few questions?

priest.name: Priest
priest.text: Of course, Jean. Notre-Dame itself stands as a symbol of our shared culture. What would you like to know?

priest.name: Jean
priest.text: Many people talk about culture as if it’s something we must protect. Why do you think that is?

priest.name: Priest
priest.text: Culture carries our memories, our identity, and our hopes. Without it, we lose the stories that tell us who we are.

priest.name: Jean
priest.text: So it connects people across generations?

priest.name: Priest
priest.text: Exactly. Culture is a bridge between past and present. It reminds us that we belong to something larger than ourselves.

priest.name: Jean
priest.text: Thank you, Father. That’s exactly the kind of insight I was looking for.

priest.name: Priest
priest.text: Anytime, Jean. May your article inspire others to cherish what we share.

louvreAfterTheft.name: Jean
louvreAfterTheft.text: What an ironic coincidence, isn’t it?

louvreAfterTheft.name: Monsieur Arnaque
louvreAfterTheft.text: I could say the same about you, right?

louvreAfterTheft.name: Monsieur Arnaque
louvreAfterTheft.text: Dried oil on paper… hardly worth our attention.

louvreAfterTheft.name: Monsieur Arnaque
louvreAfterTheft.text: Utterly disgusting, if you ask me.

louvreAfterTheft.name: Jean
louvreAfterTheft.text: So, uhm… you haven’t seen what happened to the Mona Lisa?

louvreAfterTheft.name: Monsieur Arnaque
louvreAfterTheft.text: Ah, as someone who enjoys… ahem… assisting the authorities whenever possible: no, Jean, I saw nothing.

louvreAfterTheft.name: Monsieur Arnaque
louvreAfterTheft.text: During the heist, I simply turned my back on Madam Lisa.

custodianEncounter.text: Jeeean… follow the echo… I’m waiting…

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: I promise I don’t bite… much.

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: Alright… this is getting stranger by the minute.

custodianEncounter.name: Activist
custodianEncounter.text: A guardian of Paris’ forgotten culture.

custodianEncounter.name: Activist
custodianEncounter.text: To remind the people of Paris that their culture is alive.

custodianEncounter.name: Activist
custodianEncounter.text: That art, history, and heritage matter… even when others ignore it.

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: So… taking the Mona Lisa wasn’t theft for profit,

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: it was… to make people care again?

custodianEncounter.name: Activist
custodianEncounter.text: Sometimes only a small shock can wake a city from indifference.

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: It’s not just a story for headlines.

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: It’s a story about reminding the city of its soul.

custodianEncounter.name: Activist
custodianEncounter.text: Make sure the message isn’t lost.

custodianEncounter.name: Jean
custodianEncounter.text: I’ll write the story of those who fight for what truly matters…

robot.text: Jeeean… follow the echo… coordinates updated…

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: I promise I don’t bite… much.

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: This is not what I expected when I got out of bed today.

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: Primary function: Assist and protect my creator—Bernad Arnaque.

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: And the Mona Lisa—why did you take it?

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: Bernad dreams of a future without obsolete culture.

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: I remove what stands in his way.

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: You… you stole the Mona Lisa as a love letter?!

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: My creator suffers from the weight of the past.

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: I will clear it for him.

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: So you want to… erase culture?

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: With the Mona Lisa removed, the dismantling of Parisian culture can begin.

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: Mon Dieu… this is worse than I thought.

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: Report this if you must, Jean.

robot.name: Robot
robot.text: But nothing will stop my purpose.

robot.name: Jean
robot.text: I just met a robot whose love language is cultural destruction.

audiotrack.name: Security
audiotrack.text: Halte! Arrêtez-vous! The Mona Lisa got stolen!
